fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.hem.AdjustableOutboundPort
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdjustableCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, Serializable, Remote
public class AdjustableOutboundPort extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort implements AdjustableCI
The class SuspensionEquipmentControlOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the SuspensionEquipmentControlCI component interface.
